/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and life. The sun shines brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, a tall radio tower stands out, punctuating the skyline. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes standing out against the blue sky and the varied hues of the buildings.
